entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DeflateStream truncation detection is buggy #72726
  • Can't go from build to wasm testing in one go on a M1 Mac #72722
  • [API Proposal]: Load assemblies from `ReadOnlySpan<byte>`. #72718
  • Stream.CopyTo does not respect buffer size parameter #72716

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Span<byte> constructor for MemoryStream #72723
  • The method does not work #72715
  • PerfLabTests.StackWalk.Walk has regressed on arm64 #67971
    7.0.0
  • Importer's spilling logic is incomplete in subtle ways #72133
    8.0.0
  • Randomly occurring ExecutionEngineException seemingly caused by GC #72466
    7.0.0
  • Multiple/unnecessary movzx/movsxd with char -> byte -> IntPtr casts #38794
    Future
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsynUnsafeAttribute - .NET7 Security #72711
  • Console.OutputEncoding by default returns a wrong value on Windows Nano Server #42959
    Future
  • ObjectDisposedException in System.Diagnostics.AsyncStreamReader.ReadBufferAsync #44453
    Future
  • LINQ: Combination of AsParallel, SelectMany and OrderBy of a custom IComparable throws when the enumerable contains duplicates #55159
    Future
  • crossgen.exe can't generate code for methods when the type has static Vector members #6873
    Future
  • Symbols for libnethost.lib not shipped #63602
    7.0.0
  • JsonStringEnumConverter does not properly serialize properties with default value (i.e. not set) #72699

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #72725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add SqlTypes apis for SqlClient #72724
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Generic exceptions #72721
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary return val copying in tailcall-via-help #72720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Return connection dispose in H3loopback connection #72713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • 30% optimization of `DateTime.GetDate()`/`.GetDatePart()` by 'Euclidean affine functions' #72712
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix typos #72709
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add CertificateRevocationListBuilder #72708
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Enable NJulianRuleTest #72707
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Consolidate importer spilling code #72291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #72660
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Update some more dependencies pulling in Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #72662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve reliability of WarningsAsErrors replacement #72070
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Fix ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer test #72698
    area-System.IO
  • `LibraryImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72650
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Include libnethost.pdb in implementation packages #72688
    area-Setup

Updated

  • Fixed HWIntrinsic reflection bug with `NextCallReturnAddress` intrinsic #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Hash the AssertionDsc struct for faster lookup #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [wasm] make debugger less noisy #72675
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Bail ThreadAbort redirection after catch handlers on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Provide overrides of Parallel.ForEachAsync which accept Task (not ValueTask) #26269
  • HotReload files generated in a wrong path for MAUI Blazor projects #26762

PullRequests

Updated

  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx
  • Detect invalid package locales and warn the user #26729
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-NetSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support default parameter values in lambdas #6051
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Platform warnings in Windows Forms .NET 6 project #62885
  • IntelliSense should suggest static members when accessing through instance reference #62881
  • CodeFix/CodeRefactoring Support for AdditionalFiles #62877

Closed

  • Embedded JsonParser.TryParse throws FormatException #62883
  • `PasteKnownSourceIntoSingleLineRawInterpolatedStringTests` are failing locally #62880
  • Emit DynamicallyAccessedMembers for where T : new() #62857
  • Major performance regression of the array initialization pattern #62864

PullRequests

Created

  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers
  • Trivial refactorings around generator document identity #62878
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62882
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62876
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Add array initialization optimization" #62868
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62891
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62889
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #62888
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #62887
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly - missing ConfigureAwait(false) in version 6.0.7 #42883
  • Multiple @Body(RenderFragment or sections) in blazor #42880

Closed

  • . #42881
  • Asp Net Core Identity. After publishing each release validation token is not valid #42837
  • [EPIC] Revisiting HTTPS defaults in ASP.NET Core #41990
    7.0-preview7

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks
  • Suppress downgrade error in SharedFx bundle #42857
    area-infrastructure
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Selamat #8959
  • RowDefinitions is now mandatory (was optional in Forms) #8958
  • Visual representation differs between platforms (a lot) #8954
  • WebView weird behaviour on inputs that doesn't happen outside Maui #8953
  • Can't connect to secure websocket(wss) with android 8 #8952
  • Build Liberty failed (Partial method ) #8950

PullRequests

Created

  • Subscribes to the property chain upto the application for theme binding. #8957
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Shell tab aot #8939
  • [SingleProject] Fix SplashScreen behavior on Tizen #8917
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen

Updated

  • Non shell aot #8941

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not Null Boolean Type didn't save from ChangeTracker Property #28499
  • Map Int128/UInt128 where possible #28498

Closed

  • ReplaceService IMigrationsAssembly dosen't work #28500
  • System.AccessViolationException in Add-Migration #28497
  • Scaffold-DbContext remembers the last project and reports that as a dependency #28484
  • [CosmosDB] - EFCore is failing to save when same object is assigned to entity properties twice #28495
  • Two references to the same owned type throws an invalidoperation exception when saving #28485
  • EF-SQLite: Translation of method 'System.Math.Abs' failed. #28461
  • `GroupBy(...).Select(x => x.First()).Select(...)` could not be translated #28450
  • Many-To-Many mapping with Dictionary<string, string> does not respect right/left configuration. #28398
  • How to map and use SQL Server user defined function with EF Core when using value objects? #28393
  • Cannot Add Custom Foreign Key #28376
  • Owned entity mapping for NoKey entity #28469

PullRequests

Created

  • Change from sequence-per-model to sequence-per-hierarchy when using sequences for key generation #28501
    providers-beware

Updated

  • Sugar for sequence-based key value generation on SQL Server #28477
    providers-beware
  • Add model building support for SProc mapping #28465
